name: Light (itch) (Zeno)
description:
Controls
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • LMB - Shoot
  • Enter - Skip to the Next Level
  • Backspace - Return to the Previous Level
  • R - Restart

  • Full Screen and Earphones for the Best Experience
  • Desktop Version for Better Performance

Description

"Light" is a puzzle platformer. In this game, you can toggle switches to enable or disable a platform. You can also pick up bullets to shoot enemies. Stuck on a level? Press Enter to skip the level or watch the full solution here. Good luck, boners!

A Word From The Author

The following game is made for Geo Jam with the theme "switch". This game is made in 7 days. One external asset (the soundtrack) and one premade script are used in this game.
